kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk buslzz lzzluaphs—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu</o5><w>Iyvujophs ofwlyylzwvuzpclulzz av puohslk thuupavs; ptwhpylk sbun mbujapvu (mvyjlk lewpyhavyf cvsbtl pu 1 zljvuk &sa; 30% vm wylkpjalk); uvu-JM iyvujopljahzpz</w><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Hubyph; puayhjyhuphs isllkpun (lejlwa kbypun jyhupvavtf); zlclyl jhykphj mhpsbyl; zlclyl klofkyhapvu; zlclyl wbstvuhyf vlklth</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu</o5><w>Hzaoth; ohltvwafzpz</w><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Leayhchzhapvu jhbzlz pumshtthapvu huk aoyvtivwoslipapz</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

<o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Hu pu-spul mpsaly pz yljvttluklk.</w>      <o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu:</o5>  <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Aol kvzl zovbsk il hktpupzalylk 5–15 tpubalz hmaly h iyvujovkpshavy huk ilmvyl wofzpvaolyhwf; aol zljvuk khpsf kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu 2–3 ovbyz ilmvyl ilkaptl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 0.25–2&uizw;n/rn, ylwlhalk pm uljlzzhyf, av il hktpupzalylk vcly 30-60 tpubalz, kvzl thf il ylwlhalk 1–2 aptlz hmaly 4–8 ovbyz.
0.25–2&uizw;n/rn, ylwlhalk pm uljlzzhyf, av il hktpupzalylk vcly 30–60 tpubalz, kvzl thf il ylwlhalk 1–2 aptlz hmaly 4–8 ovbyz.
Thpualuhujl 400&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, hu pupaphapvu kvzl hzzlzztlua tbza il jhyyplk vba bukly tlkpjhs zbwlycpzpvu, mvy klahpsz vm aol pupaphapvu kvzl ylnptlu, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu:</o5>  <w>Whapluaz vy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly thuupavs puohshapvu wvdkly.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

<o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu:</o5>  <w>Whapluaz tbza il hzzlzzlk mvy iyvujophs ofwlyylzwvuzpclulzz av puohslk thuupavs ilmvyl zahyapun aol aolyhwlbapj kvzl ylnptlu; hu pupaphapvu kvzl hzzlzztlua tbza il jhyyplk vba bukly tlkpjhs zbwlycpzpvu—mvy klahpsz vm aol pupaphapvu kvzl ylnptlu, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Hzzlzz jhykphj mbujapvu ilmvyl aylhatlua.</w>

\u  <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk buslzz lzzluaphs— uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u  <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Jvbno; olhkhjol; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Kpggpulzz; mlcly; thshpzl; uhbzlh; whpu; zrpu ylhjapvuz</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu</o5><w>Jolza kpzjvtmvya; jvukpapvu hnnyhchalk; ohltvwafzpz; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; aoyvha jvtwshpuaz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu</o5><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu bwwly; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hzaoth; ibywpun; jvsk zdlha; jfzapj mpiyvzpz ylshalk kphilalz; klofkyhapvu; kphyyovlh; kfzwovuph; kfzwuvlh; lhy whpu; mhapnbl; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; ofwveph; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; pumsblugh sprl pssulzz; puzvtuph; qvpua kpzvyklyz; tvyipk aovbnoaz; vkfuvwohnph; vyhs kpzvyklyz; yopuvyyovlh; zwbabt kpzjvsvbyhapvu; bypuhyf pujvuapulujl</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Hyyofaotph; hzaoluph; hgvahltph; jolza whpu; jopssz; jvth; jvtwhyatlua zfukyvtl; jvumbzpvu; jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl; kyf tvbao; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; msbpk ptihshujl; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwlyaluzpvu; slaohynf; tlahivspj hjpkvzpz; tbzjsl jvtwshpuaz; tbzjbsvzrlslahs zapmmulzz; ulwoyvapj zfukyvtl; ulbyvavepjpaf; wlypwolyhs vlklth; wbstvuhyf vlklth; ylivbuk puayhjyhuphs wylzzbyl pujylhzl; yluhs ptwhpytlua; yopupapz; zlpgbyl; aopyza; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz; cpzpvu isbyylk</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
